DOC.brief_summary: To evaluate the different indications to Open Abdomen, the different techniques used to perform it, it's management, it's definitive closure and mortality rates linked to the different variables. Moreover to evaluate the 1 month and 1 year follow up in patients underwent to Open Abdomen.
DOC.criteria: No age limit Indication to Open Abdomen Informed consent Informed consent refusal No indication to Open Abdomen
